headline: Where Does Berkshire Hathaway Stand After Solid 10% Annual Growth and Market Rate Moves?
summary: If you have been watching Berkshire Hathaway lately, you are in good company. With shares closing at $493.74 and a long track record of impressive gains, it is natural to pause before making your next move. Whether you are already invested, weighing a fresh buy, or just keeping tabs, recent price action has probably caught your eye. Over the last 7 days, the stock has dipped by 1.2%. Looking at the last 30 days, you will see a 3.4% gain. The year so far shows Berkshire up 9.5%, and over the...
